definition: alcohol/wine with high alcohol content/rich/pure/good wine/sterols
thick/deep or profound/kind/generous/rich or strong in flavor/to favor/to stress

sentences.english: Taste mellow and deep, rich wine, lingering aftertaste and balance.
sentences.chinese: 口感醇厚深邃，酒香浓郁，回味绵长而均衡。

sentences.english: Sendi Pu'er Tea with its mellow tastingfragrant smell high-rich on human health ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 其滋味醇厚香气独特富含对人体极高的保健成份。

sentences.english: Structure and full bodied wine. Eleveen en fut de chene.
sentences.chinese: 有结构感和酒体醇厚的葡萄酒。

sentences.english: Soaks this soup can let you feel Guizhou liquor culture mellowness and long.
sentences.chinese: 入泡此汤能让您感受贵州酒文化的醇厚与悠长。

sentences.english: Finely crafted, with refined tannins that coat the palate.
sentences.chinese: 良好的工艺令口感被醇厚的丹宁酸包裹着。

sentences.english: The soup in this bowl of noodles is made of bree. It tastes thick and delicious.
sentences.chinese: 这碗面的汤汁是用老汤调制的，味道鲜美醇厚。

sentences.english: To make a good-smelling cup of coffee also requires a scientific method .
sentences.chinese: 要想煮出味道醇厚的咖啡，同样需要科学的方法。

sentences.english: Mellow people usually belong to this group of online daters.
sentences.chinese: 醇厚人们通常属于这个网上daters77。

sentences.english: Refreshing and stimulating, it wakes you up with a pleasure of enjoyng the rich, heady taste.
sentences.chinese: 浓郁醇厚的味道，让你神清气爽，精力充沛。

sentences.english: Balsamic vinegar is aged until it becomes dark and mellow, with a sweet-sour flavor.
sentences.chinese: 陈酿的香醋至颜色黑暗，味道醇厚酸甜。

sentences.english: The new brand of beer had a nice taste and long aftertaste.
sentences.chinese: 这款新的啤酒味道醇厚且余韵悠长。

sentences.english: Shaoxing rice wine is great in color, smell and taste.
sentences.chinese: 绍兴黄酒，芬芳醇厚，色香味俱隹。

sentences.english: When it is brewed, the water appears green and bright, fresh and tender. The long-lasting flavor tastes mellow.
sentences.chinese: 冲泡时汤色碧绿明亮，嫩香高长，滋味醇厚。

sentences.english: Germany is famous for its strong and dark beers.
sentences.chinese: 德国因其口感醇厚的黑啤而闻名。

sentences.english: In Xitang, people are simple and unsophisticated , market is very prosperous and scene will change at every step.
sentences.chinese: 西塘民风醇厚，市场繁华，清逸秀丽，移步换景。

sentences.english: Tie Guanyin of high quality taste mellow and the sweet after taste lasts long .
sentences.chinese: 好的铁观音滋味醇厚，喝过之后回甘持久。
